title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: News Releases
body: News Releases       Paterson Youth Go On An Adventure!           Subscribe  | What is RSS     September 30, 2015  Announcing Winner of National Parks Now Competition Teams Launch Pilot Projects Van Alen Institute Releases “Six Great Ideas” for Connecting Parks to New Audiences  The National Park Service and Van Alen Institute, announced the results of National Parks Now design competition, that aims to transform the national park visitor experience as well as encourage new and diverse audiences to engage with America’s natural resources.
